content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT 'Pulverman' AS "Location",
RECEIVABLE.CUSTOMER_ID, 
CUSTOMER.NAME, 
RECEIVABLE.INVOICE_ID, 
RECEIVABLE.TYPE, 
FORMAT(CAST(RECEIVABLE.INVOICE_DATE AS DATE),'MM/dd/yyyy') INVOICE_DATE, 
RECEIVABLE.TOTAL_AMOUNT, 
RECEIVABLE.PAID_AMOUNT,
RECEIVABLE.TOTAL_AMOUNT - RECEIVABLE.PAID_AMOUNT AS BALANCE, 
RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_TYPE, 
RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_DAYS, 
RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_DATE, 
RECEIVABLE.TERMS_DESCRIPTION,
RECEIVABLE.STATUS, 
RECEIVABLE.ZERO_DATE,
FORMAT(CAST(DATEADD(DAY,RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_DAYS,RECEIVABLE.INVOICE_DATE) AS DATE),'MM/dd/yyyy') AS DueDate,
IIF(DATEDIFF(DAY,CONVERT(DATETIME, CAST(DATEADD(DAY,RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_DAYS,RECEIVABLE.INVOICE_DATE) AS DATE)),CONVERT(DATETIME, GETUTCDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time')) IS NOT NULL,DATEDIFF(DAY,CONVERT(DATETIME, CAST(DATEADD(DAY,RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_DAYS,RECEIVABLE.INVOICE_DATE) AS DATE)),CONVERT(DATETIME, GETUTCDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time')),0) AS "Age"
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/Infor/TestData/RECEIVABLE.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [RECEIVABLE]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/Infor/TestData/CUSTOMER.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [CUSTOMER]
) AS [CUSTOMER]
ON [RECEIVABLE].CUSTOMER_ID = [CUSTOMER].ID
WHERE [RECEIVABLE].ZERO_DATE IS NULL
AND (RECEIVABLE.TOTAL_AMOUNT - RECEIVABLE.PAID_AMOUNT) <> 0
AND [RECEIVABLE].STATUS <> 'X'
--AND [RECEIVABLE].TYPE LIKE 'U'
ORDER BY [RECEIVABLE].INVOICE_DATE
